summary: An ordinance providing for the laying off, opening, widening, extending and establishing of Roanoke Street, in the City of Seattle, from the Northeast margin of a diagonal street established by Ordinance No. 18517, to the center line of 25th Avenue North; providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary therefor and providing that the cost of said improvement shall be paid by special assessment upon the property specially benefited in the manner provided by law.
